name: Pung
description:
The paddles are supposed to move with the arrow key - but they don't exist aparently. (Paddle now working, AI is not!)

The Goals should be scored - but i didn't even write that code.(Now working! but you still cant win... or get past a score of 9)

The ball would move - but it doesnt. (Ball does move, very spiffy)

Pros: you cant lose

controls:

up and down - move paddle up and down.

Hit the ball into the other players Void space - located behind the player.

not worth 100 $ you crazy kids.
